revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.1)
revision.text: {{ArticleHistory |action1=PR |action1date=04:45, 26 October 2007 |action1link=Wikipedia:Peer review/Geography of Newfoundland and Labrador/archive1 |action1result=reviewed |action1oldid=167144234 |action2=GAN |action2date=12:45, 24 July 2008 |action2link=Talk:Geography of Newfoundland and Labrador/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=227617871 |currentstatus=GA |topic=geography }} {{WikiProject Canada|geography=yes|nl=yes|class=GA|importance=High}} {{WikiProject Geography|class=GA|importance=mid}} ==Complete re-write of this article is needed== This article is far too long and contains much superfluous and/or inaccurate information (for example "Amongst the fastest in the world are the western glaciers of Newfoundland, up to 7 km per year " This is utterly FALSE!). It is very difficult to read. There are many misused words and poor sentence structure. It appears that most of the article is poorly paraphrased from the noted references. I will attempt to clean it up. How did this article get rated as A-class on the quality scale? I have a personal interest in seeing the quality of this article being improved since I am from Newfoundland.[[User:Silverchemist|Silverchemist]] 04:54, 15 July 2007 (UTC) This is taking a lot of work. Any help would be greatly appreciated[[User:Silverchemist|Silverchemist]] 05:27, 16 July 2007 (UTC) {{Talk:Geography of Newfoundland and Labrador/GA1}} == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[Geography of Newfoundland and Labrador]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=730836312 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20130122002132/http://atlas.nrcan.gc.ca/site/english/learningresources/facts/islands.html to http://atlas.nrcan.gc.ca/site/english/learningresources/facts/islands.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20060221064548/http://atlas.gc.ca/site/english/maps/reference/international/world/referencemap_image_view to http://atlas.nrcan.gc.ca/site/english/index.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 11:15, 21 July 2016 (UTC)
